cluster.name: Fan Control
cluster.description: This cluster specifies an interface to control the speed of a fan as part of a heating / cooling system.

attribute.name: Fan Mode
attribute.description: The FanMode attribute is an 8-bit value that specifies the current speed of the fan.

attribute.name: Fan Mode Sequence
attribute.description: The FanModeSequence attribute is an 8-bit value that specifies the possible fan speeds that the thermostat can set.
